screen.name: doFlashImage
screen.title: Flash On the fly (select a image)

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 1), size = (1000, 38), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 40), size = (1000, 35), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 4), size = (72, 72), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 82), size = (1050, 2), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("EL_Standard", 28),gFont("EL_Standard", 26)], "itemHeight": 85 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 5), size = (650, 50), color = 0x0058bcff, color_sel = 0x00ffc000, font=0, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 50), size = (650, 80), font=1, flags = RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (780, 0), size = (200, 50), font=2,color = 0x00999999, color_sel = 0x00999999, flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (10, 5), size = (80, 80), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 36),gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 130 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 1), size = (400, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (410, 1), size = (350, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (870, 1), size = (100, 40), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1080, 1), size = (100, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("EL_Standard", 28),gFont("EL_Standard", 24)], "itemHeight": 50 }
